long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
A 0L network wallet for asset management. A user may create a new account, import a mnemonic phrase to sign transactions, or import a public address for view-only features.

Support for normal, slow, and community wallets. Each account displays its total balance, tower height, proofs this epoch, and wallet type. In addition, slow wallets will display unlocked coins and transferred coin. Validators can also see their vouchers.

Web apps may integrate with Oollet using a standard interface as defined by Aptos labs. An example integration can be found here: https://miskollc.github.io/oollet-web-example/ with along with source code.

By using this app, you indemnify the developer/publisher of any damages caused by this app, to your property or losses incurred with trades made using data supplied by this app. This app does not provide financial advice. OL wallet features may be requested.

0L is a new Layer 1 blockchain protocol. 0L is open, permissionless, and community governed.
